definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo determine the copper content of 10 Mongolian medicines.
sentences.chinese: 目標測定10種蒙藥中的銅含量。

sentences.english: ResultsThe copper content of 10 Mongolian medicines was complied with national standard.
sentences.chinese: 結果所測10種蒙藥中銅含量均符合標準。

sentences.english: Microscopic Identification of Mongolian Drug Achillea alpina L.
sentences.chinese: 蒙藥蓍草的顯微鑑別研究。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the connotation and significance of standardized research about Mongolian medicine chiefly.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重介紹蒙藥標準規範研究的內涵及意義。
